# Test data for whitespace processing

# Leading whitespace (spaces)
   text with leading spaces

# Leading whitespace (tabs)
		text with leading tabs

# Trailing whitespace (spaces)
text with trailing spaces

# Trailing whitespace (tabs)
text with trailing tabs

# Both leading and trailing
  text with both

# Multiple consecutive spaces
text    with    multiple    spaces

# Empty line


# Whitespace-only line


# Tab-only line


# Mixed tabs and spaces
	  mixed whitespace

# No whitespace
plain_text_no_whitespace
